channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Lab Finds No Contamination From Fukushima Wastewater Near Country
item.description: While many Taiwanese people remain concerned over wastewater released from Japan's Fukushima nuclear power plant reaching Taiwan, new data from the country's nuclear research insti

item.title: What Taiwanese People Expect From the New President | The Voice of the People
item.description: What do Taiwanese people think about new President Lai Ching-te and what are their expectations for the next four years? We hit the streets to find out.

item.title: Thousands Attend President Lai's Inauguration, Hope for Unity and Stability
item.description: Thousands of people traveled from around Taiwan and overseas to attend Lai Ching-te's presidential inauguration in Taipei. TaiwanPlus spoke to some of the people in the audience.

item.title: Analysis: Challenges Facing Taiwan's New Cabinet
